description: collage of printed material (advertisements for wedding rings, appliances and gun; music with image of piano keys; stamp of Disney's Snow White; image of bird; images of postage stamps; image of wheel) with painting and drawing on top; pair of blue winged nude female figures in profile at left and right; central bottom image of man's head and shoulders in profile looking toward PL, in red, with a gold guitar with a brown neck sprouting from his head; gold ring at top center; purple curving lines at left and right
marks:
Signature, Date, Title and Inscription

on back  LRC in image in black: [Douglas Bourgeois 2014]
medium: Acrylic paint and collage on board
title: Ring Bargain
